DOC.brief_summary: Text message reminders will improve adherence to lab tests in adolescent liver transplant recipients.
DOC.brief_title: Text Messaging for Adherence in Adolescent Liver Transplant Recipients
DOC.detailed_description: Adolescent patients who received a liver transplant will be recruited to participate in receiving text message reminders for lab tests. They will be send de-identified messages according to their required lab schedule. The investigators will monitor their adherence to lab tests as well as medication and clinic visits. They will also have a questionnaire about their medical regimen before and at the end of the study.
DOC.criteria: Patient >12 years Received liver transplant Followed by Stanford Liver Transplant Team No personal cell phone
